content.raw:
I'm observing some change in behaviour. Take a look at this screenshot, this branch on the left, default on the right:

![transparency.png](data/bitbucket.org/repo/jgXqbo/images/3030201745-transparency.png)

* The field is not visible through the pendulum
* There's shadow on transparent visuals
* Link frames don't show through the links
* The selected link frame is not highlighted
content.html:
I'm observing some change in behaviour. Take a look at this screenshot, this branch on the left, default on the right:

  • The field is not visible through the pendulum
  • There's shadow on transparent visuals
  • Link frames don't show through the links
  • The selected link frame is not highlighted
